text: Walter Ferrier Hamilton (1819 – 8 April 1872) was a British Liberal politician. Ferrier Hamilton was elected Liberal MP for Linlithgowshire at the 1859 general election until 1865 when he did not seek re-election at that year's election. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Scottish Liberal Party MPs Category:UK MPs 1859–1865 Category:1819 births Category:1872 deaths
title: Walter Ferrier Hamilton
